text: "Irresistible" is a 2000 song by Irish band The Corrs and is the second single from their third studio album In Blue. It went to the top twenty in the United Kingdom, Belgium, New Zealand, Romania and Scotland. ==Track listings== Standard CD and cassette single # "Irresistible" (album version) – 3:40 # "At Your Side" (live acoustic) – 3:48 # "Somebody for Someone" (live acoustic) – 3:24 European CD single # "Irresistible" (album version) # "At Your Side" (live acoustic) == References == Category:2000 songs Category:The Corrs songs
title: Irresistible (The Corrs song)
